body_html:
Anaconda is just a python distribution.
CUDA and cuDNN aare independent of Anaconda. You need to install anaconda separately, then you need to install CUDA separately.
Looks like you installed anaconda.
But now you need to follow NVIDIA's instructions to install CUDA 9.0, if you like to work with the latest version of tensorflow that uses GPU.
Alternatively, you can use tensorflow without GPU.

Please make sure to read and follow the instructions here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/

body:
Anaconda is just a python distribution.
CUDA and cuDNN aare independent of Anaconda. You need to install anaconda separately, then you need to install CUDA separately.
Looks like you installed anaconda.
But now you need to follow NVIDIA's instructions to install CUDA 9.0, if you like to work with the latest version of tensorflow that uses GPU.
Alternatively, you can use tensorflow without GPU.

Please make sure to read and follow the instructions here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/
